articles.author: Binitha Jacob
articles.title: ADHD Traits Like Distractibility And Impulsivity Are Linked To Evolutionary Benefits, Study Finds - Bored Panda
articles.description: The study suggests that traits like distractibility and impulsivity could be big advantages in certain situations.

articles.title: Dopamine and serotonin in human substantia nigra track social context and value signals during economic exchange - Nature.com
articles.description: In this article, Batten and colleagues measure fast neurotransmitter release in patients undergoing awake brain surgery. As volunteers play an economic game with human and computer partners, dopamine and serotonin track social context and value statistics.

articles.author: Kotryna Br
articles.title: “Eat Whatever Rice You Enjoy”: Dietician Debunks 16 Toxic Nutrition Myths That Just Aren't True - Bored Panda
articles.description: Dietician's TikTok video went viral, currently holding over 2.7 million views. In it, she debunks toxic food myths that were made without any scientific evidence.

articles.author: Megan Liscomb
articles.title: I'm A Millennial In Menopause And I Won't Be Silent - BuzzFeed
articles.description: I went into menopause knowing very little about it — and I know from talking with other millennials that it's a mysterious topic for many of us.
